reviewText: My gr-daughter loved the movie! This made a wonderful addition to her collection ofStrawberry Shortcake movies. She now has all of them.
Title: Strawberry Shortcake: Berry Friends Forever

reviewText: I gave this DVD for my Granddaughter as a gift! She will be 4yrs old in the beginning of July! The DVD was newly released and she was so Happy to watch it! She started watching it when I gave it to her and she Loved it! As A Mother and Grandmother I was really impressed cause the DVD included activities that could be extended To a IPad/computer thur the Internet! My owned  grown Daughter Loved Strawberry Shortcake as a young child so I would consider Strawberry Shortcake as a Classic figure! Highly Recommended
Title: Strawberry Shortcake: Berry Friends Forever

reviewText: Our 5yr old daughter LOVES this version of the Strawberry Shortcake characters! She has all the toys, books and DVDs! They are fun characters. They are pretty with great style. The stories are bright, colorful and have wonderful stories of good manners, morals & ethics. Our family are big fans!!! (*_*)
Title: Strawberry Shortcake: Berry Friends Forever

reviewText: We love all the Strawberry Shortcake movies. Strawberry and her friends are sweet, kind, colorful and unique each with their very different personalities. In these movies, the girls are all about doing whatever they can to help their community. As a "brownie" Goddess loved watching the girls doing their community services by delivering mail, painting playgrounds, and basically helping others even if this means that are taken advantage of sometimes.There isn't a little girl who wouldn't love watching Strawberry and friends in their very colorful world.
summary: Adorable Friends, Full of Color And Fun
Title: Strawberry Shortcake: Berry Friends Forever

reviewText: Grandkids keep asking for more of these movies and I am willing to buy them for them since they all have great lessons, easy to understand, and I love watching them, too.
Title: Strawberry Shortcake: Berry Friends Forever

reviewText: When I was a little girl, I loved Strawberry Shortcake. I had dolls, miniatures, and even my bed sheets were Strawberry Shortcake. Now that I am grown up with two little girls of my own, I was excited to see that my favorite character was still around. She has had a little bit of a makeover since the 80's, but all in all, she is still the same Strawberry Shortcake that I know and love. And now there are more than just toys to enjoy. Strawberry Shortcake has her own line of movies, and the newest in the DVD collection is Berry Friends Forever.This film is all about the girls getting ready to go to a formal event.  There is lots of fun some terrific songs, but it also deals with common issues like learning about manners, so there is a lesson to be learned. But they are learn that there is a fine line between manners and just being plan annoying. Once they come to a happy medium, the girls relieve the most important thing of all is friendship  Both my girls, who range in age from 3 to 12, loved sitting down to watch this film together. Its the perfect choice for a little girl time and would make a great addition to Easter baskets!***Free copy was received in exchange for an honest review on New Age Mama blog***
Title: Strawberry Shortcake: Berry Friends Forever

reviewText: For those of you who, like me, are interested in which episodes of "Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures" are contained on this DVD, here is the list:01. "Manners Meltdown" (November 1, 2010) - The town's Berry Bitty Buggy Derby is revived, but the girls are unfamiliar with the behavior for the event.02. "Good Citizens Club" (November 11, 2010) - Sadiebug and Kadiebug create a new club.03. "Team For Two" (November 12, 2010) - Lemon, Raspberry and Princess Berrykin make a Day Care Center and playground for the Baby Berrykins.04. "The Berry Best You Can Bee" (October 19, 2010) - Strawberry fills in at the bumblebee post office and finds out things don't always turn out as planned.
summary: Contains 4 episodes of "Strawberry Shortcake's Berry Bitty Adventures"
Title: Strawberry Shortcake: Berry Friends Forever

reviewText: I like the old shows better but this is ok. This updated version doesn't have as much fantasy background detail and it seems like they sing too much and really squeaky voices. Can only take a little at a time. Don't care for the newer creatures. The old stories seemed better.
Title: Strawberry Shortcake: Berry Friends Forever
